Hey Yanshosh, it was a good idea put up a bases' map in your site.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I have put up a graphical map with all the base locations that I 
know 
> of on it! There's a link to it on the events section of the site 
> (http://nbwrpg.com). I have also updated the events page itself 
(its 
> amazing how many people start bugging me when I get slow on 
updates).
> 
> So check out the map!
